verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> unto my Lord <S%H113><s%>, Sit <S%H3427><s%> at my right hand <S%H3225><s%>, until I make <S%H7896><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> your footstool <S%H1916><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of your strength <S%H5797><s%> out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: rule <S%H7287><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%>.

Your people <S%H5971><s%> shall be willing <S%H5071><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your power <S%H2428><s%>, in the beauties <S%H1926><s%> of holiness <S%H6944><s%> from the womb <S%H7358><s%> of the morning <S%H4891><s%>: you have the dew <S%H2919><s%> of your youth <S%H3208><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%>, and will not repent <S%H5162><s%>, You are a priest <S%H3548><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> after the order <S%H1700><s%> of Melchizedek <S%H4442><s%>.
The Lord <S%H136><s%> at your right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall strike <S%H4272><s%> through kings <S%H4428><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wrath <S%H639><s%>.

He shall judge <S%H1777><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, he shall fill <S%H4390><s%> the places with the dead bodies <S%H1472><s%>; he shall wound <S%H4272><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> over many <S%H7227><s%> countries <S%H776><s%>.
He shall drink <S%H8354><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>: therefore shall he lift up <S%H7311><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%>.
